Has anyone tried to drive Functional Tests with JUnit?  How did you 
accomplish it?  In particular, how could you drive a Swing GUI?

By "Functional Tests", I mean tests that check the entire application 
as a black-box (or very near to black-box testing).  It would launch 
the appliction, drive the GUI, and interpret the output of the system.

My team has been very sucessful with Unit Testing, and we want to 
advance to running Functional Tests.

- Greg
subject: Functional Testing with JUnit
